sub.0: is an open community of many thousands of positive people, targeting the root causes of all societal issues. Creating easy and fun Positive Action tools to empowering people and communities everywhere to create the World they want to live in
sub.1: you'll be joining a Global Movement. Using simple, fun activities to make a happier World for everyone to live in. Meeting positive, pro-active people and making awesome new friends both, locally and globally
sub.2: is simply: don’t live in frustration at what others aren’t doing. Lets come together do it ourselves! Uniting to take responsibility for health and happiness of life where we live ..and having heaps of fun doing it!

section_titles.3: 4. Choose a specific meeting point (hidden on street sleeper map) Point
section_titles.4: 5. How will people recognise you? (hidden on street sleeper map)

0.0: Not sure? Here's a list of suggestions:
0.1:
(if the Positive Action you want to create isn't there let us know at contact@focallocal.org)
          Give your Gathering a name

sub.2: Enter address or postcode/zip - or choose from commonly used meeting points in that city, (clicking on a commonly used point auto-fills that location into the text entry box).
sub.3: Be as specific as possible. Next to a statue? North, West of a bridge? Not sure? Check Google Earth for a good meeting spot.
sub.4: Carrying a Teddy Bear on your Shoulder? Wearing a bright yellow hat? wearing a Focallocal badge or T-shirt?
